name: ListOrgOutsideCollaborators
description:
Retrieve outside collaborators for a GitHub organization.

Use this tool to fetch a list of users who are outside collaborators for a specified GitHub organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The GitHub organization name, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: filter_outside_collaborators
parameters.description: Specify '2fa_disabled' to filter for collaborators without two-factor authentication, or 'all' for all collaborators.

value_schema.description: Filter the list of outside collaborators. `2fa_disabled` means that only outside collaborators without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to display per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to fetch results from the list of outside collaborators.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the list of outside collaborators. `2fa_disabled` means that only outside collaborators without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned.

value_schema.description: Filter the list of outside collaborators. `2fa_disabled` means that only outside collaborators without [two-factor authentication](https://github.com/blog/1614-two-factor-authentication) enabled will be returned.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
